explains: v. 保持，保留；保存，储存；记住；付定金聘定（尤指律师）；留用（员工）

sentences.en: He struggled to retain control of the situation.
sentences.cn: 他曾努力保持对局势的控制。

sentences.en: She has a good memory and finds it easy to retain facts.
sentences.cn: 她记忆力好，很容易记住事情。

sentences.en: Daily facial exercises help to retain the skin's elasticity.
sentences.cn: 每日的面部运动有助于保持皮肤弹性。
